caption.title: Diurnal variability in pH measured over a 5-day period in the middle of the study period.
caption.p: This analysis was only done for 1 mesocosm per treatment combination, serving as an example. For these 4 mesocosms in parallel, pH was recorded at 30-minute intervals with an automated pH logger (control system ACQ110 Aquatronica, Italy).
Click here for additional data file.
